system.description: You character bears the Evil Eye, the uncontrolled potential to bring harm to others around her. Characters making stress rolls in her presence are subject to an additional botch die. Characters may protect themselves through the use of an amulet or a ritual, decided upon by the troupe, which does not need to be magical or supernatural in nature. A Magic Resistance of 0 or more, including the effect of the Aegis of the Hearth, is also sufficient to guard against this effect.
